DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 10b Past 30 Days Number of Days Smoked Cigarettes Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the number of days they smoked cigarettes in the past 30 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Number of Days Smoked Cigarettes Past 30 Days
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about how many days an individual has smoked in the past 30 days.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the past 30 days, on how m
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke cigarettes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
